item.title: WTF is Futsal? Felix sport’s guide to little known high-velocity, quick-paced, team-orientated Spanish sport
item.author: Imraj Singh,Harry Lanz,
item.description: Futsal is a bit of a rogue sport: one of the rare beauties with a cult following. Relatively unknown in the UK, it has larger audiences in Argentina, Brazil, Spain, and Portugal – countries which have spawned some of the best football players in the world. That is no coincidence. The likes of Pelé, …
